completion: SELECT Player.full_name, Player_Attributes.PTS FROM Player INNER JOIN Player_Attributes ON Player.id = Player_Attributes.ID WHERE Player_Attributes.DRAFT_YEAR > 2006 AND Player_Attributes.PTS > 22 ORDER BY Player_Attributes.PTS DESC;

SELECT Player.full_name, Player_Attributes.PTS FROM Player INNER JOIN Player_Attributes ON Player.id = Player_Attributes.ID WHERE Player_Attributes.DRAFT_YEAR > 2006 AND Player_Attributes.PTS > 22 ORDER BY Player_Attributes.PTS DESC;

SELECT * FROM Game WHERE UPPER(TEAM_NAME_HOME) = UPPER('LOS ANGELES LAKERS') AND UPPER(TEAM_NAME_AWAY) = UPPER('Boston Celtics');
SELECT * FROM Game WHERE UPPER(TEAM_NAME_HOME) = UPPER('LOS ANGELES LAKERS') AND UPPER(TEAM_NAME_AWAY) = UPPER('Boston Celtics');
SELECT BIRTHDATE FROM Player_Attributes WHERE UPPER(DISPLAY_FIRST_LAST) = UPPER('JR Smith');
